SyncEvent.summary: The SyncEvent interface of the {{domxref("Background Synchronization API", "", "", "nocode")}} represents a sync action that is dispatched on the of a ServiceWorker.

remarks.para: This interface inherits from the interface.

SyncEventLastChance.summary:
The lastChance read-only property of the
interface returns true if the user agent will not
make further synchronization attempts after the current attempt. This is the value
passed in the lastChance parameter of the
constructor.
SyncEventLastChance.value:
A boolean value that indicates whether the user agent will not make further
synchronization attempts after the current attempt.

SyncEventSyncEvent.summary: The SyncEvent() constructor creates a new object.

SyncEventTag.summary:
The tag read-only property of the
interface returns the developer-defined identifier for
this SyncEvent. This is the value passed in the tag parameter
of the constructor.
SyncEventTag.value: The developer-defined identifier for this SyncEvent.
